sentence: Arizona Senator Mark Kelly and New Hampshire Senator Maggie Hassan proposed a pause on the federal gas tax, as the average price for a gallon of gas in the U.S. is over $3.45 a gallon, according to AAA, and could even rise higher.

title: With Gas Prices Averaging $3.45 a Gallon, 2 Senators Propose Halting Tax

sentence: Senators Mark Kelly, D- Ariz., and Maggie Hassan, D- NH, have proposed temporarily suspending the federal gas tax through the end of 2022 as a method to bring relief at the pump, but the plan has faced bipartisan pushback.
author: Maxwell Newman
title: Gas Could Hit $7 per Gallon
